content:
Thank you for offering! I think we've covered everything for now. It was great chatting with you about your Netflix issues and discussing some amazing TV shows. If you have any more questions or need further assistance in the future, don't hesitate to reach out.

In the meantime, I hope you enjoy trying out some of the shows I recommended, and I'm sure you'll be excited to hear more about the upcoming seasons of your favorite series. Have a fantastic day, and happy binge-watching!
